casebody.data:
Louisa B. WHITAKER
v.
John C. WHITAKER, Jr., Elizabeth N. Whitaker, II, and William A. Whitaker. No. 120P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. J. Clark Fischer, Winston-Salem, for Louisa Whitaker. William K. Davis, Alan M. Ruley, for John C. Whitaker, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th day of March 2007 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of May 2007."
